data.name: FirstTierRequired.Text
data.value: At least one pricing tier must be set

data.name: ViewRolesRequired.Text
data.value: At least one role must be set as view roles

data.name: EventTimeRequired.Text
data.value: Event start and end time must be properly set

data.name: SummaryOrDescriptionRequired.Text
data.value: Either summary or full description is required

data.name: AddLocationFirst.Text
data.value: Locations are not defined, click here to add a location first

data.name: Category.Help
data.value: Please choose a category for this event

data.name: UpToXCategories.Text
data.value: You can choose no more than [X] categories

data.name: Location.Help
data.value: The venue that holds this event

data.name: Summary.Help
data.value: A brief description of this event, which will be displayed in the event list view

data.name: Description.Help
data.value: The full description of this event, you can leave it blank if the summary above well described this event

data.name: Featured.Help
data.value: Featured events will be displayed in higher priority

data.name: Pending.Help
data.value: Pending events will not be visible to end users

data.name: StartDateTime.Help
data.value: The date / time this event starts

data.name: EndDateTime.Help
data.value: The date / time this event ends

data.name: EventLasts.Help
data.value: A event could last all day or a few hours

data.name: EventLogo.Help
data.value: You can optionally choose/upload a logo for this event

data.name: RecurringPattern.Help
data.value: If this event recurrs on random dates, you can set the dates in special recurring dates below

data.name: StopAfter.Help
data.value: You can set the last recurring date if this event discontinues at some day

data.name: SpecialRecurringDates.Help
data.value: This event also happens on these dates

data.name: BlackoutDates.Help
data.value: This event does not happen on these dates

data.name: RequireRegistration.Help
data.value: Choose this option if customers must register - either paid or not paid - to attend this event

data.name: RolesCanBook.Help
data.value: Roles that can book for this event

data.name: MaxOccupancy.Help
data.value: The maximum occupancy of this event, you can set it to be the number of attendees, or the number of bookings

data.name: ChargeBy.Help
data.value: Choose free if no charges apply

data.name: CostPerBooking.Help
data.value: The cost per booking, regardless to the number of attendees

data.name: CostPerAttendee.Help
data.value: The cost per attendee, you can have many pricing tiers

data.name: BulkDiscount.Help
data.value: The discount policy when there are more than 1 attendees, you can enter either a number like 2.5 or a percentage like 5%

data.name: VisibleTo.Help
data.value: If this event is not supposed to be visible to all users, choose the roles that can see this event

data.name: PhoneNumber.Help
data.value: The phone number will be displayed beside event details

data.name: EmailAddress.Help
data.value: The email address which recieves all notifications of this event

data.name: Facebook.Help
data.value: The facebook url of event organizer

data.name: Twitter.Help
data.value: The twitter url of event organizer

data.name: SEOKeywords.Help
data.value: Event summary will be used instead if SEO keywords are not set

data.name: AdvanedReminder.Help
data.value: Confirmed attendees will receive email notifications before this event starts, use this option to set how long ago the email is sent

data.name: ReviewReminder.Help
data.value: After the event is finished, you can remind all attendees to post reviews for this event

data.name: PostToGroup.Help
data.value: Post this event to these social groups
